Text: Can some bright person tell me how to install this to a kindle fire. I don't know where to put the data file.
didn't work on my samsung galaxy s 3
Paste the obb folder in Android/obb folder.. copy the whole com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftIMHM there. not just the obb file.
Thank you thank you thank you. It worked perfectly. Now I know how to install all the games. GREAT.
Great to hear that your problem is solved. :)
